metadata.title: CVE-2023-3246 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE/CE affecting all versionsstarting before 16.3.6, all versions starting from 16.4 before 16.4.2, allversions starting from 16.5 before 16.5.1 which allows an attackers toblock Sidekiq job processor.

criterions.comment: gitlab-agent package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
